Package edu.umb.cs682.ecom.backend.security

Class WebSecurityConfig

  • Object
    • WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
      • WebSecurityConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurityConfigurer<Filter,​WebSecurity>, WebSecurityConfigurer<WebSecurity>
    @Configuration
@EnableWebSecurity
@EnableGlobalMethodSecurity(prePostEnabled=true)
public class WebSecurityConfig
extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
    WebSecurityConfig provides HttpSecurity configurations for this app. This class orchestrates security across the entire backend.

      • configure

        public void configure​(AuthenticationManagerBuilder authenticationManagerBuilder)
               throws Exception
        Obtains an AuthenticationManager using the given AuthenticationManagerBuilder, adding user details and encoding the user's password with a PasswordEncoder.
        Overrides:
        configure in class WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
        Parameters:
        authenticationManagerBuilder - the SecurityBuilder to be used
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs when adding the UserDetailsService based authentication

      • configure

        protected void configure​(HttpSecurity http)
                  throws Exception
        Configures the HttpSecurity for this app.

        Configures CORS, CSFR, session management, resource protection rules, specifies the AuthEntryPointJwt handler, and adds the AuthTokenFilter.

        Overrides:
        configure in class WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter
        Parameters:
        http - the HttpSecurity to be configured
        Throws:
        Exception
